mapper.select: SELECT SUM(a.`order_num`) AS total FROM `app_order_archive` a WHERE a.`airport_id` IN (#{ariportIds}) AND a.`year`=#{year} and a.month=#{month}

SELECT a.`airport_id`, a.`airportname`, SUM(a.`order_num`) AS order_num FROM app_order_archive a where a.`airport_id` IN (#{ariportIds}) AND a.`year`=#{year} and a.month=#{month} GROUP BY a.`airportname`,a.`airport_id`

SELECT a.`airport_id`, a.`airportname`, a.`bname`, a.`id`, SUM(a.`order_num`) AS order_num FROM app_order_archive a where a.`airport_id` IN (#{ariportIds}) AND a.`year`=#{year} and a.month=#{month} GROUP BY a.airport_id, a.`airportname`, a.`bname`, a.id
